DESCRIPTION: Set a custom png leaderboard design for your server. All you have to do is go through the process.
reply: Reply with the image you want to set as background
text:
__Use the following emojis:__
▶️` To view the next design`
◀️` To view the previous design`
✅` Save and move to the next step`
🔄` To restart changes to default`
❌` To cancel board setup`
